short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep Reddit on a more positive note

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Decide which subreddits you want to keep out of your front page, and this extension will filter out the rest. Whether you're tired of political bickering or don't want to see someone die as you start your day, this extension helps you create a more positive Reddit experience.
